ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Van Allen Probe A Relativistic Electron Proton Telescope, Level 3 Science Data
ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains Level 3 pitch angle sorted electron and proton fluxes from the Relativistic Electron Proton Telescope (REPT), which is one of three instruments on the Energetic Particle, Composition and Thermal Plasma Suite (ECT) onboard Van Allen Probe A. REPT points perpendicular to the spin axis of the spacecraft and measures high-energy electrons (4-10 MeV). It also measures magnetospheric and solar protons in the energy range of 20-75 MeV to capture most intense events. Please check the Data Quality and Caveats page on the ECT home page and contact the ECT team for known data issues.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: NASA Space Physics Data Facility (SPDF) CDAWeb.
